attributes.name: Archmage's Hunting Rifle
attributes.description: "Even mages need to eat."
attributes.parsed_description: "Even mages need to eat."

attributes.name: Archmage's Steel Wand
attributes.description: "The archmage imbued his rapier with such power that it became a living conduit for arcane energy."
attributes.parsed_description: "The archmage imbued his rapier with such power that it became a living conduit for arcane energy."

attributes.name: Archon's Frozen Spear
attributes.description: "Mages specialize in a variety of magics, but those who favor frost have found spears to be an effective conduit for their spells."
attributes.parsed_description: "Mages specialize in a variety of magics, but those who favor frost have found spears to be an effective conduit for their spells."

attributes.name: Arctic Depths
attributes.description: "Feel the steady strength of this gauntlet, as stable as the deep arctic currents which find their way across the sea."
attributes.parsed_description: "Feel the steady strength of this gauntlet, as stable as the deep arctic currents which find their way across the sea."

attributes.name: Arctic Dusk
attributes.description: "At sunset, even the tundra can appear warm and inviting."
attributes.parsed_description: "At sunset, even the tundra can appear warm and inviting."

attributes.name: Aristocrat's Fine Hatchet
attributes.description: "While the high born rarely do phyiscal labor, they do enjoy tossing the occasional axe at a stuffed target."
attributes.parsed_description: "While the high born rarely do phyiscal labor, they do enjoy tossing the occasional axe at a stuffed target."

attributes.name: Arm of the Aggressor
attributes.description: "You shall be the first to wet your blade with the blood of your enemies."
attributes.parsed_description: "You shall be the first to wet your blade with the blood of your enemies."

attributes.name: Artificial Life
attributes.description: "For a short time a tentative peace stood across Aeternum. It lasted meer days."
attributes.parsed_description: "For a short time a tentative peace stood across Aeternum. It lasted meer days."

attributes.name: Artisan's Axe
attributes.description: "This weapon was the mangum opus of a great smith who resided in Windsward."
attributes.parsed_description: "This weapon was the mangum opus of a great smith who resided in Windsward."

attributes.name: Artisinal Great Axe
attributes.description: "Never has a more fine axe been crafted."
attributes.parsed_description: "Never has a more fine axe been crafted."

attributes.name: Artistry
attributes.description: "The world is but a canvas. This warhammer is my brush, and your blood is my paint."
attributes.parsed_description: "The world is but a canvas. This warhammer is my brush, and your blood is my paint."

attributes.name: Ascension
attributes.description: "Rise up and meet your challenge."
attributes.parsed_description: "Rise up and meet your challenge."

attributes.name: Ashen Curse
attributes.description: "Bound by fire to forever walk this land."
attributes.parsed_description: "Bound by fire to forever walk this land."

attributes.name: Ashen Dark Staff
attributes.description: "When the lights go out, who will be your ally?"
attributes.parsed_description: "When the lights go out, who will be your ally?"

attributes.name: Ashen Rifle
attributes.description: "Soot is smeared all over the barrel making this weapon difficult to see at night."
attributes.parsed_description: "Soot is smeared all over the barrel making this weapon difficult to see at night."

attributes.name: Ashen Victory
attributes.description: "When the pillaging was over, the bandit's axe was covered in ash and blood."
attributes.parsed_description: "When the pillaging was over, the bandit's axe was covered in ash and blood."

attributes.name: Ashen Wake
attributes.description: "To ash with them. They will burn here and in the afterlife."
attributes.parsed_description: "To ash with them. They will burn here and in the afterlife."

attributes.name: Ash to Dust
attributes.description: "Your remains shall be scattered to the winds. You shall be forgotten."
attributes.parsed_description: "Your remains shall be scattered to the winds. You shall be forgotten."

attributes.name: Assassination Blade
attributes.description: "Depose the king, depose the queen, it's all the same to me. So long as there is coin in my pocket, I will kill whoever you ask."
attributes.parsed_description: "Depose the king, depose the queen, it's all the same to me. So long as there is coin in my pocket, I will kill whoever you ask."

attributes.name: A Terrible Thought
attributes.description: "I spoke my mind and they recoiled in horror. Then, one by one, they agreed."
attributes.parsed_description: "I spoke my mind and they recoiled in horror. Then, one by one, they agreed."

attributes.name: Athena's Charge
attributes.description: "As fierce a warrior as Athena was, her skill with a bow was nearly umatched."
attributes.parsed_description: "As fierce a warrior as Athena was, her skill with a bow was nearly umatched."

attributes.name: A Thousand Cuts
attributes.description: "The grip is wrapped in a biting hemp rope, unfit for soft hands."
attributes.parsed_description: "The grip is wrapped in a biting hemp rope, unfit for soft hands."

attributes.name: A Thousand Voices
attributes.description: "As you grip the handle you can hear them... Or are those your thoughts?"
attributes.parsed_description: "As you grip the handle you can hear them... Or are those your thoughts?"

attributes.name: Atlas Killer
attributes.description: "Sometimes large destruction comes in small packages."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes large destruction comes in small packages."

attributes.name: A Trick of the Mind
attributes.description: "Watch more closely now, for if you blink, you will miss it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Watch more closely now, for if you blink, you will miss it."

attributes.name: A Trick of the Mind
attributes.description: "Watch more closely now, for if you blink, you will miss it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Watch more closely now, for if you blink, you will miss it."

attributes.name: Avarice
attributes.description: "Look upon others and want not. Or do. No one can stop you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Look upon others and want not. Or do. No one can stop you."

attributes.name: Awoken Ash Staff
attributes.description: "Dark ash covers the light wood creating a messy appearance."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dark ash covers the light wood creating a messy appearance."

attributes.name: Axe of the Abomination
attributes.description: "Stitched together and reborn in undeath, the abomination wielded an axe of massive proportions and cut down soldiers by the dozen."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stitched together and reborn in undeath, the abomination wielded an axe of massive proportions and cut down soldiers by the dozen."

attributes.name: Axe of the Abyss
attributes.description: "Many souls are lost as they try to harness the power of Corruption. To do so is to lose oneself."
attributes.parsed_description: "Many souls are lost as they try to harness the power of Corruption. To do so is to lose oneself."

attributes.name: Axe of the Binding
attributes.description: "We are one. Our fates are entertwined."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are one. Our fates are entertwined."

attributes.name: Axe of the Cold Depths
attributes.description: "The bottom of the ocean is as cold as the north pole."
attributes.parsed_description: "The bottom of the ocean is as cold as the north pole."

attributes.name: Axe of the Elder Gods
attributes.description: "The first humans thought the Ancients to be gods. They forged weapons and armor in the name of their new deities."
attributes.parsed_description: "The first humans thought the Ancients to be gods. They forged weapons and armor in the name of their new deities."

attributes.name: Axe of the Final War
attributes.description: "We have fought wars our whole life, but none like this."
attributes.parsed_description: "We have fought wars our whole life, but none like this."

attributes.name: Axe of the First Culling
attributes.description: "The first time they came to my village, they took ten of us. They promised the next time would be far worse."
attributes.parsed_description: "The first time they came to my village, they took ten of us. They promised the next time would be far worse."

attributes.name: Axe of the Forgotten Son
attributes.description: "Forsaken by his family, all the soldier had left was the clothes on his back and the weapon in his hand."
attributes.parsed_description: "Forsaken by his family, all the soldier had left was the clothes on his back and the weapon in his hand."

attributes.name: Axe of the Vast Caverns
attributes.description: “Look down. Can you see the bottom?”
attributes.parsed_description: “Look down. Can you see the bottom?”

attributes.name: Axe of Violence
attributes.description: "For those who think violence is the answer, this axe is their ultimate goal."
attributes.parsed_description: "For those who think violence is the answer, this axe is their ultimate goal."

attributes.name: Azoth Imbued Spear
attributes.description: "Brimming with pure azoth infusion, this spear is bursting at the seams with raw energy."
attributes.parsed_description: "Brimming with pure azoth infusion, this spear is bursting at the seams with raw energy."

attributes.name: Azoth Staff
attributes.description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.
attributes.parsed_description: Crackling with preternatural power, an Azoth Staff is the emblem and tool of the anointed Soulwarden.
